name.ja: ウィトクロース・デメテル

requirement.en: During a turn you have not Special Summoned a monster from the Graveyard.

effect.en: Your opponent excavates the top 2 cards of their Deck. You can Special Summon 1 monster with a Level equal to or lower than [the total Levels of the excavated monsters] from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Your opponent places the excavated cards on the top of their Deck in any order.
